EmailTemplate.description: Sends an email to the applicant to complete a report on their event.
EmailTemplate.name: BIC-Grant - Event Follow-Up Report Request
EmailTemplate.subject: City of Toronto - Business Incubation Grant Report Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Business_Incubation_Grants__c.First_Name__c},
Thanks again for involving the City of Toronto in your recent event - {!Business_Incubation_Grants__c.Name_of_Event__c}. We appreciate the opportunity to be involved.
As part of our sponsorship of the event, we require some feedback on the event. Could you please complete the following report form?
https://cityoftoronto.tfaforms.net/355816?Email={!Business_Incubation_Grants__c.Email__c}&accid={!Business_Incubation_Grants__c.Account_IDId__c}&conid={!Business_Incubation_Grants__c.Contact_IDId__c}
Thanks and please keep us involved in your upcoming activities.
Regards, Nina
Nina Gesa Economic Development Officer City of Toronto www.toronto.ca/business
